title: Perfect Assassin
description: With the world's most wanted assassin behind bars, the good men of ONYXX could relax. Until the killing started again - and every shot bore the mark of the master. But that was impossible...wasn't it?Beautiful and mysterious, Prisca Reznik had been trained by the best. And now it was time for her to polish off the men on her father's kill file - beginning with Jacy "Moon" Madox, the man who'd supposedly killed her mother. But when she crash-landed into his backyard, Moon seemed to target her as the love of his life. "hen Prisca realized who Moon was, she would be targeting him, too. For very different reasons...
author: Wendy Rosnau
